short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AIUB Teachers Performance Evaluation - Questionnaires Form Filler

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
1) All the "Strongly Agree" checkboxes will be checked.
2) In the comment, "Best faculty ever!" will be written.
3) The form will be auto-submitted.
